Description: first take the coffee machine and add some wattle in it then switch it on

take the dirty dishes and put them into the sink, then open the sink faucet so that water runs out and then add some soap from the soap bottle. then take the dish sponge and rub it on the dirty plates
take the apple and place it on a plate on the counter, the take a knife and start cutting the apple into slices
take the toaster and place it on the counter, then take the bread and place it in the toaster then turn the toaster on and set the time

first take a pan and put it on the stove, light the gas, then take the egg and a spoon which you use to break the egg and pour it on the pan. the take the salt in the salt shaker and shake some on the egg and use the spoon to roll the egg

take the tomato and cut it into small pieces using a knife on the counter top, then put it into the pot and place the pot on the stove and light it. then add some salt from the salt shaker and water from the sink. use a spoon to stir

cut a tomato into pieces using a knife, the cut the lettuce into smaller pieces. put the tomato in a pot and put it on the stove and turn it on, use a spoon to stir. then add the lettuce and some salt then some water from the sink
first fill the pot with water from the sink then place it on the stove and turn on the stove. let the water heat until it boils
first take egg and check whether it is cracked. if cracked then throw it in the bin
open the fridge door and the take out the food stuffs inside and throw away into the bin the ones that are no longer needed
Find the microwave. Then put the sliced potato in to cook it
Find the cup and then pour wine into the cup
Open the fridge and keep the food inside it
Take a cup. The fill the cup with water
Take the potato. put the potato on hot water to boil it
Collect the unused apple slices. Then throw those unused slices away
Collect all utensils. Then keep those utensils in drawer

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_20_1
Description: Find the cup with coffee. Then pour away the coffee from the cup
Find the pot first. Then pour away the water from the pot
Find the switch for the kitchen light fist. Then switch the off the kitchen light
Find the laptop, turn it on.
FIRSTLY FIND REMOTE OF THE TELEVISION AND THEN SWITCH ON IT

Task: Check the timing on the watch_201_1
Description: Find the watch, and read off the time on the watch
Firstly, find the CreditCard, Keychain, Newspaper, and Remote. Secondly, find the box. Place the CreditCard, Keychain, Newspaper, and Remote inside of the box.
Firstly, find the TissueBox. If used, throw the TissueBox into the bin.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_218_1
Description: Walk to table. Observe switch on lamp. Activate switch.
Use waving statue to break the hand phone screen
Find the phone in the room and turn it on to use.
take the pillow from sofa and clear it.
Find the book beside the television,pick it up to read.
